text: There is a real patriotism underneath the best of my music but it is a critical, questioning and often angry patriotism.
author: Bruce Springsteen

text: These fallen heroes represent the character of a nation who has a long history of patriotism and honor - and a nation who has fought many battles to keep our country free from threats of terror.
author: Michael N. Castle

text: Well, the post office is probably not the place you want to go if you want to be infused with patriotism and a renewed sense of vigor.
author: Adam Carolla

text: There is no patriotic obligation to help advance the career of a politician who is otherwise pursuing interests that are fundamentally antithetical to your values. That's not the call of patriotism.
author: John Bolton

text: I don't want to see the military falling. I want to see the military rising to dignified heights of professionalism and true patriotism.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi
